Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.storage

Interface ResourceStash

All Known Subinterfaces:
ResourceDepot
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicDepot, LeaderDepot, UnlimitedStorage
public interface ResourceStash
This interface indicates that the implementing class can act as a generic container for resources as part of a player board. It has methods for increasing and decreasing the contained resources, as well as visualizing its content.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clear()
    Empties the storage of its entire content
    int getNumOfResource​(ResourceType resource)
    Returns the stored amount of the given resource
    java.util.List<ResourceType> getStoredResources()
    Returns the resources stored in storage
    void removeResource​(ResourceType resource, int quantity)
    Remove a certain amount of the given resource from storage

  • Method Details

    • removeResource

      void removeResource​(ResourceType resource, int quantity) throws NotEnoughResourceException
      Remove a certain amount of the given resource from storage
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource to be decreased in quantity
      quantity - the amount of resource to remove from the amount stored
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResourceException - - if the given resource is not present in the storage in the amount to be deleted

    • clear

      void clear()
      Empties the storage of its entire content

    • getNumOfResource

      int getNumOfResource​(ResourceType resource)
      Returns the stored amount of the given resource
      Parameters:
      resource - - the resource the amount of which is asked
      Returns:
      the amount of the given resource contained in storage

    • getStoredResources

      java.util.List<ResourceType> getStoredResources()
      Returns the resources stored in storage
      Returns:
      a List of the stored resource types (if there are no resources in storage, the list is empty)
